request.description:
**Endpoint**: GET /Express_shipment

**Description**: Returns ListBusinessPartners

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/express-shipment/business-partners

**Method**: GET

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/express-shipment/business-partners' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ5IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZW5fVVMiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA1MTA0MDEsImV4cCI6MTcxMDU5NjgwMX0.nYQbrcT9RyHNRCf-oNM50ZVSO6uJ9gvrQQ7e0fzU9Ik'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{
    "record_count": "6",
    "records": [
        {
            "id": 117,
            "value": "C&W",
            "tax_id": "",
            "name": "C&W Construction",
            "description": ""
        },
        {
            "id": 118,
            "value": "JoeBlock",
            "tax_id": "",
            "name": "Joe Block",
            "description": ""
        },
        {
            "id": 119,
            "value": "GardenUser",
            "tax_id": "",
            "name": "GardenUser BP",
            "description": ""
        },
        {
            "id": 121,
            "value": "Patio",
            "tax_id": "",
            "name": "Patio Fun, Inc.",
            "description": ""
        },
        {
            "id": 120,
            "value": "SeedFarm",
            "tax_id": "",
            "name": "Seed Farm Inc.",
            "description": "Customer & Vendor"
        },
        {
            "id": 112,
            "value": "Standard",
            "tax_id": "",
            "name": "Standard",
            "description": "Walk-In Customer"
        }
    ],
    "next_page_token": ""
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

response.name: ListBusinessPartners

request.description:
**Endpoint**: GET /Express_shipment

**Description**: Returns ListProducts

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/express-shipment/products/{order_id}

**Method**: GET

**Parameters (Params)**

order_id (Int32, Mandatory)

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/express-shipment/products?order_id=100' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ5IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZW5fVVMiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA1MTA0MDEsImV4cCI6MTcxMDU5NjgwMX0.nYQbrcT9RyHNRCf-oNM50ZVSO6uJ9gvrQQ7e0fzU9Ik' \
--data ''

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{
    "record_count": "1",
    "records": [
        {
            "id": 130,
            "upc": "",
            "sku": "",
            "value": "Plum Tree",
            "name": "Plum Tree",
            "description": ""
        }
    ],
    "next_page_token": ""
}

 ```

**Common mistakes**

- order id does not have a valid value
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Fill mandatory fields:  Order",
    "details": []
}

 ```

- The id entered does not match any of the records
    

``` json
{
    "record_count": "0",
    "records": [],
    "next_page_token": ""
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

**Endpoint**: POST /Express_shipment

**Description**: Returns Shipment

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/express-shipment/shipments

**Method**: POST

**Parameters (Body)**

order_id (Int32, Mandatory)

is_create_lines_from_order (Bool, optional)

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/express-shipment/shipments' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ5IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZW5fVVMiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA1MTA0MDEsImV4cCI6MTcxMDU5NjgwMX0.nYQbrcT9RyHNRCf-oNM50ZVSO6uJ9gvrQQ7e0fzU9Ik' \
--data '{
    "order_id": 100,
    "is_create_lines_from_order":true
}'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{
    "id": 1000000,
    "document_no": "600004",
    "date_ordered": "2021-01-22T04:00:00Z",
    "movement_date": "2024-03-15T04:00:00Z",
    "order_id": 100,
    "is_completed": false
}

 ```

**Common mistakes**

- order id missing
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Fill mandatory fields:  Order",
    "details": []
}

 ```

- order id does not match any record
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Order * Not found *",
    "details": []
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

**Endpoint**: DELETE /Express_shipment

**Description**: Returns Empty

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/express-shipment/shipments/:id

**Method**: DELETE

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location --request DELETE 'http://api.adempiere.io/express-shipment/shipments/1000000' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ5IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZW5fVVMiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA1MTA0MDEsImV4cCI6MTcxMDU5NjgwMX0.nYQbrcT9RyHNRCf-oNM50ZVSO6uJ9gvrQQ7e0fzU9Ik'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{}

 ```

**Common mistakes**

- reception id does not match the records
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Shipment/Receipt * Not found *",
    "details": []
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

**Endpoint**: POST /Express_shipment

**Description**: Returns Shipment

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/express-shipment/shipments/{id}/process

**Method**: POST

**Parameters (Params)**

id (Int32, Mandatory)

**Parameters (Body)**

description (String, optional)

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/express-shipment/shipments/100/process' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ5IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZW5fVVMiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA1MTA0MDEsImV4cCI6MTcxMDU5NjgwMX0.nYQbrcT9RyHNRCf-oNM50ZVSO6uJ9gvrQQ7e0fzU9Ik' \
--data '{
    "description":"prueba"
}'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Entrega / Recibo Procesado",
    "details": []
}

 ```

**Common mistakes**

- the id does not match any open period
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Process failed :Period Closed",
    "details": []
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

**Endpoint**: POST /Express_shipment

**Description**: Returns ShipmentLine

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/express-shipment/shipments/{shipment_id}/lines

**Method**: DELETE

**Parameters (Params)**

shipment_id (Int32, Mandatory)

**Parameters (Body)**

description (String, optional)

product_id (Int32, Mandatory)

quantity (String, optional)

is_quantity_from_order_line (Bool, optional)

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/express-shipment/shipments/100/lines' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ5IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZW5fVVMiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA1MTA0MDEsImV4cCI6MTcxMDU5NjgwMX0.nYQbrcT9RyHNRCf-oNM50ZVSO6uJ9gvrQQ7e0fzU9Ik' \
--data '{
    "description":"prueba",
    "product_id":120,
    "quantity":"4",
    "is_quantity_from_order_line":true
}'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Shipment/Receipt Processed",
    "details": []
}

 ```

**Common mistakes**

- the product id does not have a valid value
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Fill mandatory fields:  Product",
    "details": []
}

 ```

- the shipment id does not match any of the records
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Shipment/Receipt * Not found *",
    "details": []
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

**Endpoint**: GET /Express_shipment

**Description**: Returns ShipmentLine

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/express-shipment/shipments/{shipment_id}/lines

**Method**: GET

**Parameters (Params)**

shipment_id (Int32, Mandatory)

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/express-shipment/shipments/100/lines' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ5IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZW5fVVMiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA1MTA0MDEsImV4cCI6MTcxMDU5NjgwMX0.nYQbrcT9RyHNRCf-oNM50ZVSO6uJ9gvrQQ7e0fzU9Ik'
 ```
